Name: Mystery Metal
Description: Used for refining weapons, helmets, and clothing parts to improve their performance.
Description$english: Used for refining weapons, helmets, and clothing parts to improve their performance.
Description2$english: A unique alloy made by heritage Forging techniques, it is said that its manufacturing process was taught to the Artisan Guild by the Bapharian Creed, hence the name.

recipes.Name: Mystery Metal
recipes.Des: Use Baru Ore to create Mystery Metal for Refine, which can refine weapons, helmets, and clothes to enhance their performance.
recipes.Des$english: Use Baru Ore to create Mystery Metal for Refine, which can refine weapons, helmets, and clothes to enhance their performance.

recipes.Name: Mystery Metal - Beginner
recipes.Des: Use Baru Ore to create Mystery Metal for Refine, which can refine weapons, helmets, and clothes to enhance their performance.
recipes.Des$english: Use Baru Ore to create Mystery Metal for Refine, which can refine weapons, helmets, and clothes to enhance their performance.

NeedMaterial.Name: Baru Ore
NeedMaterial.Description: Can be converted into Mystery Metal for refining gear parts after Forging .
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Can be converted into Mystery Metal for refining gear parts after Forging .
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A basic ore with a black shiny luster. It has a relatively hard texture, a slightly rough surface, and irregular patterns.

NeedMaterial.Name: Instant-Ignition Carbon Powder
NeedMaterial.Description: A material that needs to be added during Forging .
NeedMaterial.Description$english: A material that needs to be added during Forging .
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting.

recipes.Name: Instant-Ignition Carbon Powder ×15
recipes.Des: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting.
recipes.Des$english: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting.

NeedMaterial.Name: Charcoal
NeedMaterial.Description: Wood-fired products, primarily used as building materials.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Wood-fired products, primarily used as building materials.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Though seemingly simple, the kiln process demands precision, especially in sealing!

recipes.Name: Charcoal ×10
recipes.Des: Though seemingly simple, the kiln process demands precision, especially in sealing!
recipes.Des$english: Though seemingly simple, the kiln process demands precision, especially in sealing!

NeedMaterial.Name: Pine Timber
NeedMaterial.Description: A raw material that can be reprocessed by life professions.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: A raw material that can be reprocessed by life professions.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Available exclusively through merchants from alternative regions, as pine timber is protected in Asteria Plains.

recipes.Name: Mystery Metal - Master
recipes.Des: Producing Mystery Metal with Baru Rich Ore yields <style="accent-gn">higher expected output</style> compared to standard ore. It serves as a vital material for gear refinement, enhancing the performance of weapons, helmets, and garments.
recipes.Des$english: Producing Mystery Metal with Baru Rich Ore yields <style="accent-gn">higher expected output</style> compared to standard ore. It serves as a vital material for gear refinement, enhancing the performance of weapons, helmets, and garments.

NeedMaterial.Name: Baru Rich Ore
NeedMaterial.Description: Can be converted into a larger amount of Mystery Metal for refining gear parts after Forging .
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Can be converted into a larger amount of Mystery Metal for refining gear parts after Forging .
NeedMaterial.Description2$english:
A basic ore with a black shiny luster. It has a relatively hard texture, a slightly rough surface, and irregular patterns.
Rich ores usually appear in clusters, containing much more mineral content than ordinary ores, but are less abundant and naturally more expensive.

recipes.Name: Mystery Metal- Pro
recipes.Des: Producing Mystery Metal with Baru Pure Ore yields <style="accent-gn">higher expected output</style> compared to standard ore. It serves as a vital material for gear refinement, enhancing the performance of weapons, helmets, and garments.
recipes.Des$english: Producing Mystery Metal with Baru Pure Ore yields <style="accent-gn">higher expected output</style> compared to standard ore. It serves as a vital material for gear refinement, enhancing the performance of weapons, helmets, and garments.

NeedMaterial.Name: Baru Rich Ore
NeedMaterial.Description: Can be converted into an even larger amount of Mystery Metal for refining gear parts after Forging .
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Can be converted into an even larger amount of Mystery Metal for refining gear parts after Forging .
NeedMaterial.Description2$english:
A basic ore with a black shiny luster. It has a relatively hard texture, a slightly rough surface, and irregular patterns.
High-precision ores usually appear in areas with high Engram concentration, with some refined ores showing crystallization, containing much more mineral content than ordinary ores, and are very rare.
